title: Rads error ?
body: I started to experience rads error last time for some weird reason and ever since then i was not able to play League Of Legends. My friend and i have  been experiencing the same problems is this a problem with League ? or TPG? My friend and i both use TPG and considering TPGs record for really bad internet it would be understandable to point the blame at TPG. I've also done every possible thing for rads error, but i've had no luck so far PLEASE HELP

replies.body:
i'm with tpg. can't get on. tried atleast 4 fixes. it was working for a day or 2 and then went back to not working. usually it sorts itself out in an hour, but this time its lasted for days and still not fixed.

edit : should i call tpg? does that work?
Yes, this may be an old thread, but if TPG provided you with a preconfigured modem/router, that router has an internal firewall that you can safely turn off.
same problem cant even go in to login screen
I haven't contacted TPG and mine has been like this for over a week and now it's working again. Guess you just gotta wait.
Oh I'm getting this too and I'm with TPG as well.

Bro, i'm having this problem at the moment. 

i am with TPG. 


I have friends that are with other service providers and their lol works fine. 

its from TPG's end connection to the LOL server. You have to call up and abuse em to get somewhere. This has happened before and it took em a week to fix the problem. 

its not from RIOT's end unfortunately

Hi,
Did calling TPG work for you?
This is so annoying.
Yes i am also experiencing the same problem i am also with tpg it is highly likely that it is from riots end {{champion:74}}
